profileSummary: Management Engineering student at the University of Waterloo (Graduating 2026) with experience across quality engineering, product development, and data-driven process improvement. I've worked in high-precision manufacturing, product platforms, and engineering projects, delivering measurable impact through root-cause analysis, automation, and user-focused solutions.

projects.title: NourishNudge – AI Ingredient Substitution Engine
bullets: Developed and tuned tree-based ML models (XGBoost, Random Forest) for ingredient substitutions, achieving 92% accuracy in user testing
Conducted user testing and incorporated feedback to improve match accuracy and satisfaction by 35%
projects.outcome: 92% substitution accuracy with 35% improvement in user satisfaction

projects.title: CleverDeck – Flashcard Creation Platform
bullets: Boosted active user sessions by 45% through modular study flows and flashcard tracking dashboards
Implemented feedback collection and adoption tracking to refine study flow experience, increasing feature usage by 25%
projects.outcome: 45% increase in active sessions, 25% increase in feature usage

bullets: Upcoming role in quality engineering operations
experience.impact: Future position focused on quality engineering

bullets: Identified recurring defects across 3 production lines by conducting root cause analysis and leading sprint-based resolution mapping
Built Tableau dashboards using inspection results and triage logs to enable data-informed prioritization of defect resolution
Standardized quality documentation in Confluence and linked it to version-controlled procedures in Git
experience.impact: 35% reduction in defect rates, 15% reduction in onboarding time

experience.role: Maintenance Planning Engineer Intern – Internal Tools
bullets: Reduced inventory holding costs by 25% by redesigning Excel-based forecasting models and refining reorder logic
Leveraged CMMS data to map technician workflows and reduce average task cycle time by 20%
Built a single-page KPI dashboard to support agile reviews and track team performance trends
Led risk assessments on $5M+ capital projects, aligning deliverables across 4 departments to avoid delays
Developed planning templates, and roadmapping frameworks that reduced delivery prep time by 30%
Coordinated stakeholder feedback to align project deliverables with long-term city planning initiatives
experience.impact: 30% reduction in prep time, $5M+ project risk management

bullets: Automated 4 workflows using Google Apps Script, cutting manual input by 40% and reducing approval delays
Designed and implemented interactive dashboards in Google Data Studio to track platform usage and measure adoption rates
experience.impact: 40% reduction in manual input, optimized 5 HR systems

leadership.title: President – UW Entrepreneurship Society
bullets: Led 10+ campus tech and design events and boosted engagement by 40% using Airtable tracking workflows
Partnered with sponsors and internal teams to align event roadmaps with society KPIs, securing over $8,000 in funding

education.program: Bachelor of Applied Science in Management Engineering
